Sihyeon

EVERGLOW

Introduction

Kim Sihyeon is a South Korean singer, dancer, and actress under Yuehua Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group EVERGLOW.

Sihyeon first gained recognition for her participation in the first season of MNET's hit survival show Produce 101, from which she was eliminated after ranking 40th place, and its third season, Produce 48, where she was eliminated after ranking 27th place this time.

On February 18, it was announced that Sihyeon, along with her fellow trainee from Produce 48, Yiren, were selected as members of Yuehua Entertainment's new girl group called EVERGLOW. Concurrently, Stone Music Entertainment released a teaser video on their YouTube channel, introducing Sihyeon as the inaugural member of the group.

She made her debut with EVERGLOW on March 18, 2019 with the release of their first digital single "Arrival of Everglow", and its title song "Bon Bon Chocolat".

On February 7, 2020, Sihyeon was announced as one of the new MC of SBS' The Show. She held that position until her last broadcast on February 2, 2021, when it was announced that she would be stepping down from her role.

On April 12, 2024, it was reported that she would be debuting as an actress in the upcoming series called 'Salon de Holmes'.
